alert.note: Alert for Fergus; Judith Basin (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:25PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Judith Basin and west central Fergus Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 324 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Hobson, or 13 miles east of Stanford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stanford, Hobson, Danvers, Windham, Moccasin and Benchland. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 38 and 64, and between mile markers 70 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central Montana.
